title: Diagnostic Assessment-Based Instructional Design for Optimizing Personalized Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Customized language training for working professionals requiring immediate applicability to workplace contexts

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their language proficiency levels through pre-assessments and establish individualized learning roadmaps
Learners can achieve over 80% mastery of differentiated learning content (reading/writing/speaking) based on assessment results to improve workplace application skills
Learners can self-evaluate weekly learning progress and incorporate feedback using digital platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
